{"id":1521550779,"question_id":3747,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737932764,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521550779/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Difference Between Adjacent Elements in a Circular Array","memory":"30.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxAdjacentDistance(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int ret = 0;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            ret = max(ret, abs(nums[i]-nums[(i-1+n)%n]));\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-difference-between-adjacent-elements-in-a-circular-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
